author: kinetickoala
content: Not sure if this is the right place to ask so please direct me if there is a good place. Has anyone thought or discussed a priority fee mechanism for entries\exits? There is already an off chain market for this, it would be interesting to bring this onchain and have the fees go to staking participants. I saw eip-8061 about increasing churn limits, adding a priority fee to that could be very cool

author: potuz
content: You mean the offchain market is on pool operators charging more to get out earlier or something else?

author: kinetickoala
content: I give you 32eth - fee, in exchange for your validator sitting in queue. Hence, you just exited your validator. Move this behavior onchain by having a priority exit queue. People pay fee to queue skip, validators choose next "exitor" by picking highest paying one. Additional revenue source for validators from the fee
